name: Life is Simply Unfair
description:
Default Controls
  • Use the mouse to navigate the menu.
Story

Life is Simply Unfair is a board game designed to stress you out. It's the night before a big stressful event in your life, and you're having a nightmare with a test at the end. If your stress is too high the test becomes impossible. 

Created for the "Panic" Little Awfuljam, 2017.

Help
  • There is no help, this game is unfair.
Credits Game
  • Systemlogoff - You can also reach me via eMail.

  • Mihai Zetta - From Team Dogpit Games
Music
